f= int(raw_input())
for i in range(f):
    a = int(raw_input())
    b = [ int(q) for q in raw_input().split()]
    c = [ int(q) for q in raw_input().split()]
    d=0
    for k in range(a):
        if max(b[:]) <= max(c[:]):
            b.remove(max(b[:]))
            c.remove(max(c[:]))
            d+=1
        else:
            b.remove(max(b[:]))
    print d
